content: u t slip_stitch t q in e en ial quintessential w co l cowl quintessential = having five parts by malissa fields 1 rich mountain fiber co 5 mini skein kit sample made with starman waiting in the sky us 6 4mm 16 inch circular knitting needle using color a cast on 144 stitches and join for working in the road being careful not to twist place a stitch marker at the beginning of round k2 p2 for 6 rounds color changes as follows color b and knit 1 row color a and knit 3 row color b and knit 1 row color a and knit 2 row color b knit 2 row color a knit 2 row color b knit 3 row color a knit 2 row color b knit 3 row color a knit 1 row break color a but continue with color b c 1 row b 3 row c 1 row b 2 row c 2 row b 2 row c 3 row b 2 row c 3 row b 1 row break color b and continue color c repeat row above changing colors after each repeat with color e after above pattern end with 6 rounds of k2 p2
